statements: SELECT * FROM grant_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE success_rate > 0.5;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, success_rate FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount >= 5000;
SELECT grant_amount, application_id FROM grant_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY application_date ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount, success_rate FROM grant_applications WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY success_rate DESC, grant_amount ASC;
SELECT applicant_name, application_date, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'Jane%' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(grant_amount) AS avg_grant_amount, MAX(success_rate) AS max_success_rate FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 10000 AND success_rate > 0.7;
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM grant_applications;
SELECT grant_id, grant_amount, success_rate FROM grant_applications;
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, application_date, grant_amount FROM grant_applications;
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, application_date, success_rate FROM grant_applications;
SELECT result_id, grant_id, approval_status, review_date FROM grant_results;
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE success_rate > 0.8 ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, application_date, grant_amount, success_rate FROM grant_applications JOIN grant_results ON grant_applications.grant_id = grant_results.grant_id WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' AND review_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, feedback FROM grant_applications LEFT JOIN grant_results ON grant_applications.grant_id = grant_results.grant_id AND approval_status = 'Pending'

SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, application_date, approval_status FROM grant_applications INNER JOIN grant_analysis ON grant_applications.grant_id = grant_analysis.grant_id WHERE success_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY approval_status ASC, application_date DESC

SELECT grant_id, applicant_name, feedback FROM grant_applications LEFT JOIN grant_results ON grant_applications.grant_id = grant_results.grant_id WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY applicant_name ASC
SELECT * FROM grant_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_date, review_score FROM grant_reviews;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, grant_amount, application_date FROM grant_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM grant_applications
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, grant_amount, application_date FROM grant_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC

SELECT grant_applications.applicant_name, grant_reviews.reviewer_name, grant_reviews.review_score FROM grant_applications INNER JOIN grant_reviews ON grant_applications.application_id = grant_reviews.application_id

SELECT grant_applications.applicant_name, grant_reviews.reviewer_name, grant_reviews.review_score FROM grant_applications INNER JOIN grant_reviews ON grant_applications.application_id = grant_reviews.application_id WHERE grant_reviews.review_score > 4

SELECT grant_applications.applicant_name, AVG(grant_reviews.review_score) AS avg_review_score FROM grant_applications INNER JOIN grant_reviews ON grant_applications.application_id = grant_reviews.application_id GROUP BY grant_applications.applicant_name ORDER BY avg_review_score DESC
SELECT * FROM grant_applications;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_applications ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT reviewer_id, reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM grant_reviewers;
SELECT review_id, application_id, reviewer_id, review_date, score FROM grant_reviews ORDER BY review_date;
SELECT * FROM grant_applications WHERE grant_amount > 1000 ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name FROM grant_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT reviewer_name, expertise_area FROM grant_reviewers ORDER BY reviewer_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, success FROM grant_analysis WHERE success = TRUE AND review_id IN (SELECT review_id FROM grant_reviews WHERE score >= 90);

SELECT * FROM grant_reviews JOIN grant_analysis ON grant_reviews.review_id = grant_analysis.review_id WHERE grant_reviews.score < 70 AND grant_analysis.success = FALSE ORDER BY grant_reviews.review_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM GrantApplications ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount FROM GrantApplications WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT status, count(*) FROM GrantApplications GROUP BY status;
SELECT RA.applicant_name, RS.criteria, RS.score FROM GrantApplications RA JOIN ReviewScores RS ON RA.id = RS.review_id;
SELECT GT.grant_type_name, RA.applicant_name FROM GrantApplications RA JOIN GrantTypes GT ON RA.id = GT.grant_type_id ORDER BY RA.applicant_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM GrantApplications;
SELECT applicant_name, grant_amount, submission_date FROM GrantApplications ORDER BY submission_date DESC;
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM GrantApplications GROUP BY status;

SELECT ra.applicant_name, rh.status, rs.criteria, rs.score FROM GrantApplications ra JOIN ApplicationHistory rh ON ra.id = rh.application_id JOIN ReviewScores rs ON rh.application_id = rs.review_id WHERE rs.score >= 8;
SELECT rt.grant_type_name, COUNT(*) as count FROM GrantApplications ra JOIN GrantTypes rt ON ra.id = rt.grant_type_id GROUP BY rt.grant_type_name ORDER BY count DESC;
